constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 29 (Monday, February 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHIFF:
H.R. 1075.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18, the Necessary and Proper
Clause. Additionally, the Preamble to the Constitution
provides support of the authority to enact legislation to
promote the General Welfare.
[Page H515]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: Rim of the Valley Corridor Preservation Act
